Shaders/Renderloops

General

std_rloop_ambient.xml

Description: ambient term lighting. Just renders the geometry with the ambient term, no lights.

Usage: Scenes that only need ambient term lighting (something simple or perhaps cartoon like rendering)

Number of steps: 1

Steps:

  • Ambient step with default ambient.xml shader applied.


std_rloop_diffuse.xml

Description: dynamic lighting. An ambient pass and lights pass.

Usage: Scenes with dynamic lighting.

Number of steps: 2

Steps:

  • Ambient step with default ambient.xml shader applied.
  • diffuse lightiter step with default light_bumpmap.xml shader applied.


std_rloop_shadowed.xml

Description: dynamic lighting with shadows. The shadows are sharp edged and its heavier on the processor so there will be a fps drop.

Usage: Scenes with dynamic lighting and stencil shadows.

Number of steps: 2

Steps:

  • Ambient step with default ambient.xml shader applied.
  • diffuse lightiter/stencil step with default light_bumpmap.xml shader applied.

std_rloop_shadowed2.xml

Description: dynamic lighting with shadows. It is faster than shadowed renderloop but it will only do shadows for closed objects.

Usage: Scenes with dynamic lighting and stencil shadows.

Number of steps: 2

Steps:

  • Ambient step with default ambient.xml shader applied.
  • diffuse lightiter/stencil2 step with default light_bumpmap.xml shader applied.

std_rloop_shadowmap.xml

Description: dynamic lighting with shadows. Does shadows using projected textures. (experimental)

Usage: Scenes with dynamic lighting and soft shadows.

Number of steps: 3

Steps:

  • depth step with default distance.xml shader applied.
  • Ambient step with default ambient.xml shader applied.
  • diffuse lightiter step with default shadowmap.xml shader applied.

std_rloop_standard.xml

Description: static lighting with precalcalculated shadows.

Usage: Scenes with static precalculated lighting and shadows.

Number of steps: 1

Steps:

  • standard step with default std_lighting.xml shader applied.

std_rloop_terrainfixed.xml

Description: static lighting with precalcalculated shadows for worlds with terrain.

Usage: Terrain scenes with static precalculated lighting and shadows.

Number of steps: 3

Steps:

  • ambient step no default shader applied.
  • terrain splat step no default shader applied.
  • standard step with default std_lighting.xml shader applied.

std_rloop_terrain.xml

Description: dynamic lighting for worlds with terrain.

Usage: Terrain scenes with dynamic lighting.

Number of steps: 5

Steps:

  • ambient step no default shader applied.
  • dynamic lightiter step no default shader applied. (zuse)
  • splatting ambient step no default shader applied.
  • terrain splat lightiter step no default shader applied.
  • diffuse lightiter step no default shader applied. (ztest)


Other

std_rloop_fattest

Is an experimental renderloop that is supposed to auto adjust to all conditions.
